meanings.definition: A person who takes particular pleasure in fine food and drink.
meanings.sent1: The epicures at the party savored every bite of the gourmet dishes.
meanings.sent2: The group of epicures visited the new restaurant to sample the chef's creations.
meanings.sent3: The epicures were so delighted by the dessert that they ordered seconds.
meanings.sent4: She was an epicure when it came to trying exotic cuisines from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The epicures' eyes lit up as they saw the beautifully presented dishes on the menu.

meanings.definition: A person with refined taste in food and wine.
meanings.sent1: Among the epicures, he was known for his ability to distinguish the subtle flavors in wine.
meanings.sent2: The epicures gathered for a wine tasting event to appreciate the different notes in each glass.
meanings.sent3: The epicures chuckled at the idea of pairing caviar with potato chips.
meanings.sent4: Her palate was so refined that she could be considered an epicure of the highest order.
meanings.sent5: The epicures' discerning palates could detect even the slightest hint of truffle in the dish.
